ygData.subject: Re: Quest Help(riverdale)
ygData.msgSnippet: Can anyone tell me about the quest to get the observer staff?? I know it includes a lens off an Eye in Runnyeye and I have that what else do I need and where
ygData.messageBody:
Can anyone tell me about the quest to get the observer staff?? I know it
includes a lens off an Eye in Runnyeye and I have that what else do I need
and where does the quest originate etc.. any help would be appreciated.

Thanx!!
----- Original Message -----
From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 04, 1999 11:03 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Quest Help(riverdale)


> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> Bone Armor is supposed to come from the Ogre Shaman
> camp in W. Karana. They are incredibly tough and I am
> guessing a party of level 30s to get them. Maybe
> someone who has defeated them has more info.
>
> Not sure about the other items.
>
> Belgarth Wolfstrider
>
> --- robert nunez <homenunez@...> wrote:
> > From: "robert nunez" <homenunez@...>
> >
> > I am sorry let me say this again i meant the
> > MIDNIGHT MALLET
> >
> > and if so how do i go about getting it?
> > also a few more things i have questiins for
> >
> > there are a few items that are supossed to be in
> > west karana
> >
> > glowing bone collar ac5 plus 25 hp 25 plus mana
> > bone armplates ac5 plus 5 stenght -4 dex
> > chipped bone braclet ac4 wisdom plus 5
> >
> > as far as i can see any class any size can use
> > it...it is very low in weight
> > but where in west karana do i get it on what kinda
> > monster and what level..
> >
> >
> > thankyou for your time Ventura (rallos)
